name: LLM Visibility
description: Measures how often your brand appears in direct responses from major LLMs (chatGPT, Gemini, Claude).
insights: High visibility in ChatGPT-4 for transactional queries.
Low visibility in Gemini for informational queries.
issues: Brand is often confused with 'Acme Ltd' in older model snapshots.

recommendations.title: Disambiguate Entity
recommendations.description: Update 'About Us' schema to strictly define corporate identity.

recommendations.title: Target Informational Queries
recommendations.description: Create content specifically answering 'What is...' questions.

name: Trust & EEAT
description: Evaluates the perceived authority and trustworthiness of your brand entity within the Knowledge Graph.

recommendations.title: Maintain Wikipedia Citations
recommendations.description: Ensure recent press releases are cited in secondary sources.

name: Citation Authority
description: Tracks the quality and volume of citations from high-authority AI-weighted sources.
insights: Good coverage in tech new aggregates.
issues: Lack of presence in academic or deep-research datasets.

recommendations.title: Publish Whitepapers
recommendations.description: Release original research to gain academic citations.

name: AI Sentiment
description: Analyzes the emotional tone and subjective description of your brand in generated text.
insights: Overwhelmingly positive sentiment in product reviews summaries.

name: Share of Voice
description: Compares your entity's frequency of mention against top 5 competitors in your sector.
issues: being mentioned 3x less than market leader.

recommendations.title: Aggressive Comparison Campaigns
recommendations.description: Create 'Us vs Them' pages to force association.

name: Non-Branded Coverage
description: Your effective visibility for category-defining terms without using your brand name.
insights: Ranking well for long-tail, struggling with head terms.
issues: Generic terms are dominated by aggregators.

recommendations.title: Topic Cluster Strategy
recommendations.description: Build comprehensive guides around core category terms.

name: Knowledge Graph Strength
description: The completeness and accuracy of your brand's node in public and private knowledge graphs.
insights: Entity is fully resolved in Google Knowledge Graph.
